headlines.headline: Apple May Sell Folding iPhone to Jump-Start Troubled Sales
headlines.content:
Apple Inc. (NASDAQ: AAPL) may launch an expensive folding iPhone. Major competitor Samsung already has its folding phone product Z Fold6. It sells for as much as $1,900.

headlines.headline: Warren Buffett Famously Warned to “Make Money While You Sleep” or “You Will Work Until You Die”: 5 Stocks To Invest Like Buffett
headlines.content: Warren Buffett advocates investing in high-quality dividend stocks, emphasizing passive income and long-term wealth by reinvesting consistent dividends.
